name: dv8
description: ## Introduction A low level v8 based JS runtime with small footprint (well, as small as is possible with v8)

scripts.docker-debug: docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/out/bin:/usr/local/bin -v $(pwd)/out/lib:/usr/local/lib -v $(pwd)/examples:/app -p 3000:3000 --name dv8-debug -p 9222:9222 dv8 dv8 httpd.js
